title: Can't log in
body: Everytime I attempt to login I get met with "an unexpected error has occurred while logging in, please try again". I have tried uninstalling league, repairing it, restarting my PC, restarting my internet... nothing works. This started 4 days ago... Please help.

replies.body: We've had a couple issues with people receiving the wrong error message, so this *might* actually be an incorrect password error. Go ahead and hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), as it does look like a password change was submitted recently.

I haven't changed my password, nor have I been notified that my password was changed via email. I also just attempted to change my password and it is telling me "incorrect password".

Edit: Okay after digging through my emails I actually did find an email saying that someone requested a password change on the 4th of October. This wasn't me, and in the email it states that if I didn't request a password change to leave the email alone. That being said, obviously my password was changed, so might I ask why I didn't receive a follow-up email regarding the change?

Edit 2: So I decided to do a password recovery, which sent instructions to my email and I successfully changed my password. That being said, I received no follow up email stating my password has been changed. Don't you guys think you should probably email people when their passwords have been changed? That seems to be important information that a owner of an account should know, right?

i've had this happen on both of my accounts recently, with the same error message. check you're attached emails i had someone change my password on me. It could be just one possibility. could be something else.

same issue. I go disconnected mid game in aram. Ever since(it has nwo been 5 hours)I have not been able to log in to any of my accounts. I have tried redownloading league and everything. I am curious if it has to do with me using ethernet at the time?
